extendedInfo.description: If you are Three Days Grace's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Three Days Grace's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Three Days Grace's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Three Days Grace's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Three Days Grace- One-X- Life Starts Now- Transit of Venus--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- Animal I Have Become- Anonymous- Bitter Taste- Born Like This- Break- Broken Glass- Bully- Burn- Chalk Outline- Drown- Expectations- Get Out Alive- Give In To Me- Give Me A Reason- Goin' Down- Gone Forever- Happiness- Home- I Hate Everything About You- It's All Over- Just Like You- Last To Know- Let It Die- Let You Down- Life Starts Now- Lost In You- Misery Loves My Company- Never Too Late- No More- Now Or Never- On My Own- One-X- Operate- Over And Over- Overrated- Pain- Riot- Running Away- Scared- Sign Of The Times- Someone Who Cares- Take Me Under- The Good Life- The High Road- Time Of Dying- Time That Remains- Unbreakable Heart- Wake Up- Without You- World So Cold

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Maybe one day the person who created this app could add a button that has music and add onother button that saves the music in playmusic
reviews.author: Israel Roldan

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This app is amazing for my fav Band it don\'t need wifi so its great on the go (:
reviews.author: mustafa ofcheese

reviews.comment: Tells you every lyric for all four albums. Very handy when I want to learn how to sing a three days grace song
reviews.author: nayia moore

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: I love three days grace especially Adam Gontier. My fav forever!!
reviews.author: Viona Loos

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Im a big fan of three days grace this is so handy
reviews.author: Lorena Gonzalez
